docs.text: PESCA PESCA (proportion of population-specific and shared causal variants) is a software package for estimating proportions of population-specific and shared causal variants from GWAS summary statistics. Software requirement For compiling and running PESCA g++ (version 4.7.2) boost C++ library (1.55) BLAS library To compile the PESCA program, please cd into src/ , and then type make . Python requirement Python 2.7 (sorry!) NumPy 1.15+ Pandas 0.23.4+ PySnpTools 0.3+ SciPy 1.1.0+ StatsModels 0.9.0+ Contact Huwenbo Shi : hshi_AT_hsph.harvard.edu
